# Vince Canger

> Founding Developer Relations Engineer @ wasp.sh. Building developer tools in Heidelberg, Germany.

## Fullstack Projects

- Open SaaS (https://opensaas.sh) - Open-source, full-featured SaaS boilerplate starter with agent skills, payments with Stripe or Polar.sh, GPT wrapper demo app, file uploads with S3, analytics dashboard, and more.
- CoverLetterGPT (https://coverlettergpt.xyz) - Open-source, $500 MRR. Generate cover letters from job descriptions + your CV
